projects.title: Extensively customizable exam scheduler
description: An exam scheduler that can be extensively customized to fit the needs of different users and institutions.

It can assign multiple lecture halls for certain course, if one lecture hall can't fulfill the strength of the course. It also tries to minimize the number of cases where students have to give more than one exam in 24 hours.
The algorithm uses Graph coloring + Randomized optimization techniques.

projects.title: A chatbot based on the BoW technique
description: A bag of words based chatbot that can perform tasks like to do list, define words, note taking, fetching time in particular city, country or timezones, etc. The bot was able to maintain context of previous messages.
The sequential neural network model was trained using tensorflow, and the dataset for the bot was made from scratch, listing out all the requirements that I had, from the bot.

projects.title: A general purpose discord bot
description: The bot had features that included server moderation, games, music playback, jokes, and meme creations.
